Articles.Content: Is their a mod that replaces the Duna skin with the real Mars skin, same with jool and kerbin and stuff? and i know the real solar system mod does it but i dont like the planets too be that big and far apart. thanks

Real Solar System with a different scale config. I know there's a 6.4x config out there, and I think I saw a 1.5x config, too. You should be able to adapt one of those if you can't find an existing one. Edited September 11, 2014 by Master Tao

Real Solar System with a different scale config. I know there's a 6.4x config out there, and I think I saw a 1.5x config, too. You should be able to adapt one of those if you can't find an existing one.

I much prefer the 1/10th. It's a little more difficult to get to orbit, but you don't have to download any of the RSS special stuff.
Texture Replacer can do that if you can find the right texture packs.
